com.camerontec.catalys.util.marketdata

Interface ISecurityDefinitionUpdate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FixMarketDataInstrument, StandardInstrument

    public interface ISecurityDefinitionUpdate
    Classes maintaining security definition data can allow it to be updated externally using these methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setSecurityDefinition(StandardUpdateEntry[] changes)
      Update the security definition data contained in the passed array of changes.

    • Method Detail

      • setSecurityDefinition

        void setSecurityDefinition(StandardUpdateEntry[] changes)
        Update the security definition data contained in the passed array of changes.

        In a FIX environment, it is important that all changes relating to a given FIX security definition should appear together in the changes array.

        Processing of the changes array terminates once an entry with a 0 fieldID is encountered. This allows an array to be reused for passing in events. For example, a market data service could allocate a large array of StandardUpdateEntry objects, and just use the entries required on each update, delimited by an empty entry (fieldID <= 0).

        Parameters:
        changes - Array of StandardUpdateEntry containing field ID's and their updated values.
